title: All Ball - Stephen F. Austin's Duke Takedown; Luka Doncic Potential; Analyst Mike O'Donnell, Chicago Trib Writer Teddy Greenstein
itunes:title: All Ball - Stephen F. Austin's Duke Takedown; Luka Doncic Potential; Analyst Mike O'Donnell, Chicago Trib Writer Teddy Greenstein
description:
This week, Gottlieb gives his thoughts on Stephen F. Austin's unexpected upset of #1 Duke at Cameron Indoor, the secret to beating the Blue Devils, how college basketball is building next year's NBA draft picks' brands, and why Luka Doncic could be this generation's Larry Bird. Doug is also joined by CBS college hoops analyst Mike O'Donnell breaks down Stephen F. Austin's Duke upset, his top one-and-done freshman, top team, and his most over and underrated teams. Chicago Tribune writer on the latest version of the Bulls' rebuild, and if Zach Lavine can be a true franchise player. He also answers listener questions, Make sure you download, rate and subscribe here to get the latest All Ball Podcasts!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
